price: ហើយចំណែកឯក្រុមអាដវិញ ពួកគេត្រូវបានគេបំផ្លាញ ដោយខ្យល់ព្យុះដ៏ត្រជាក់បំផុត។
arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā ʿādun fa-uh'likū birīḥin ṣarṣarin ʿātiyatin
